thread.section_title: Tailor4Less Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Tailor4Less | tailor4less.com
thread.title: Nick

author: Nick
title: Nick
text: I was a little apprehensive ordering clothing online from overseas, but the measuring process is well-explained with instruction videos which makes it really easy, and the choices are great. For the price of an off-the-rack shirt here I got a made-to-measure shirt, great quality, delivered to my door in a little over a week. Fantastic service, really happy and will definitely return for future purchases.
